reviewText:
Grew up watching Topo Gigio?
Want to share the same experience with your own family?
I spent weeks trying to find Topo Gigio DVD's to no avail.  Fortunately I was presently surprised to find it on Amazon, and glad I did. My son truely loves watching this singing mouse dance around with his friends and toys as he sing classic Topo Gigio songs.
Really enjoyed watching growing up, and love it even more sharing with my family!

Includes the following:
1. La Fiesta de Gigio 2. Las Prefiero a Todas 3. Toma Leche 4. Cantando los Numeros 5. Tacos y Helados 6. El es mi Amigo Topiot 7. Mi Nuevo Hermanito 8. Senor Semaforo 9. Los Ruiditos 10. Mis Dos Papas 11. Los Globitos 12. El Mosquito Atrevido 13. Gigio en el Dia del Nino 14. Mama una Hermana mas 15. Quiero Parecerme a mi Papa 16. Mi Mejor Amigo 17. Hay Susana 18. Los Ninos del Mundo 19. Por Comer muy Apurado 20. Mama Maestra 21. Esa es mi Mamita Linda 22. El Tren de Chocolate
